name: h3-node
description: H3 Bindings to node using N-API

scripts.update-h3: rm -rf build && rm -rf h3 && git clone https://github.com/uber/h3 && cd h3 && git checkout v3.2.0 && cmake . -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-fPIC && make && rm -rf .git && cd .. && node-gyp-build

author: David Ellis <isv.damocles@gmail.com>
